name: Snake Plant
detail: Known as a 'mother-in-law's tongue,' this hardy plant is perfect for purifying air and thrives in low light conditions. Ideal for offices and homes.

name: Adenium Plant
detail: Often called 'Desert Rose,' this flowering plant has thick stems and beautiful pink blooms. Perfect for bright, sunny spaces.

name: Devil Backbone Plant
detail: A unique plant with zig-zag stems and small leaves. Low-maintenance and a great conversation starter for any space.

name: Spider Plant
detail: An easy-to-care-for plant with arching green and white leaves. Known for its ability to reduce indoor air pollution.
